snippet: The president's campaign released a 28-song playlist that has some clear themes, like "Keep on Pushing." It also displays a diversity in styles and regions.
abstract: The president's campaign released a 28-song playlist that has some clear themes, like "Keep on Pushing." It also displays a diversity in styles and regions.
lead_paragraph: Three musical touchstones that have probably never been associated with President Obama are country, "raw choral pop" and REO Speedwagon. Yet those are three of the revelations of a Spotify playlist created by the president's campaign staff, released via a Twitter message Thursday morning.

headline.main: The Obama Spotify Playlist: A Little Bit Country, a Little Bit Indie and REO Speedwagon
